message.body: I miss you! How's your break going?

I miss you too! It's going well. Anna got here yesterday so that's fun. Other than that sleeping and hanging out with Neelima and her family, mostly :) what about you, how is your break going? What have you been up to?
That sounds lovely. :) Mine's been great, too. Just been spending time with my sister and parents, which has been fantastic. Flying up to michigan tomorrow!
